snippet.title: MIGHT'N MOW'EM - Free Steam Demo out now!
snippet.description:
Download Might'n Mow'em Demo on Steam
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1969100?utm_source=youtube

Join us on Discord!
https://discord.gg/FvxZnV7fjW

Mow thousands of enemies with an ever-growing arsenal of weapons and magic. Upgrade your RPG character class in a rogue-lite manner, find epic loot, and unlock mighty perks to cause even more mayhem in the next run – solo or in multiplayer.

 "Who will the best?" - contest is running.
https://store.steampowered.com/news/app/1969100/view/3365894791521329321
